summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1636, for the improvement of the alley in block 5, D. S. Maynard's Plat of the Town (now City) of Seattle, being the alley from Jackson Street to King Street, between Occidental Avenue and 1st Avenue South, by paving the same with vitrified brick laid upon a proper concrete foundation, under Ordinance No. 17428 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
